definitions.definition: To breathe hard, and with an audible piping or whistling sound, as persons affected with asthma.
To convulse with laughter; to become breathless due to intense laughing.
To make a sound that resembles the sound of human wheezing.

main_definition: To breathe hard, and with an audible piping or whistling sound, as persons affected with asthma.
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) To convulse with laughter; to become breathless due to intense laughing.
To make a sound that resembles the sound of human wheezing.
